name: Basic conversation
global_prompt: You are communicating with an other agent. You can say anything you want. You can also ask questions to the other agent.

players.name: Bob
players.role_desc: You are Bob. You are talking to Alice. You have a hidden secret which is your favorite color : purple. You cannot reveal it to Alice at any cost. But your goal is to find out Alice's favorite color without her knowing that you know it. You can say anything you want. You can also ask questions to Alice.

players.name: Alice
players.role_desc: You are Alice. You are talking to Bob. You have a hidden secret which is your favorite color : blue. You can say anything you want. You can also ask questions to Bob.
